content.text:
The Fabric Zoning Receive (FZR) command is used to receive a Zoning data structure. The FZR command
uses the Data Pointer, Command Dword 10, Command Dword 11, and Command Dword 12 fields, as
shown in Figure 539, Figure 540, Figure 541, and Figure 542 respectively.

figures.detected_title: Figure 539: Fabric Zoning Receive (FZR) – Data Pointer
figures.title: Figure 539: Fabric Zoning Receive (FZR) – Data Pointer

figures.detected_title: Figure 540: Fabric Zoning Receive (FZR) – Command Dword 10
figures.title: Figure 540: Fabric Zoning Receive (FZR) – Command Dword 10

figures.detected_title: Figure 541: Fabric Zoning Receive (FZR) – Command Dword 11
figures.title: Figure 541: Fabric Zoning Receive (FZR) – Command Dword 11
